item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>i have located the error in my style sheet and it is working now.</p>

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Looks just fine in Safari bar one minor thing: when hovering over / clicking the tabs at the top, the text goes white (as well as the tab itself) in Safari. HTH!</p>
item.content:encoded: Looks just fine in Safari bar one minor thing: when hovering over / clicking the tabs at the top, the text goes white (as well as the tab itself) in Safari. HTH!
